lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The trade minister said yesterday should Seoul revalue the won suddenly Korea would run "a tremendous trade deficit and could degenerate into a country, like many other developing countries, which is reneging on its international obligations."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: S. Chamber of Commerce "Demands that Korea carry out a drastic and sudden currency revaluation of five or 10 pct are, I believe, extremely ill-advised."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Seoul announced in January the lifting of bans on 158 items, including sensitive agricultural products and large cars, effective from July.
